about_the_game:
Game ideas:

This world is not just black and white.
Alive, and find more colors.
Between black and white.

Game introduction:

This is a simple plane shooting survival game.
You can use the ink line to control your position, and you can shoot an ink bullet to destroy other ink balls. Your purpose is to get through the obstacles and reach the end.
It is must be a difficult challenge.
In addition, you can endless "kill" in survival mode, and finally get a "world" what you did, a painting.

From author:

The content of the entire game is very simple, and the operation is very simple, but the difficulty is extraordinary, it is time to test your patience.
If you think this game hurts you, please tell me, I will be sad for you, just one second. :)
In the end, it is not easy to make a game by oneself. I hope everyone can respect the contributions of each cre
detailed_description:
Game ideas:

This world is not just black and white.
Alive, and find more colors.
Between black and white.

Game introduction:

This is a simple plane shooting survival game.
You can use the ink line to control your position, and you can shoot an ink bullet to destroy other ink balls. Your purpose is to get through the obstacles and reach the end.
It is must be a difficult challenge.
In addition, you can endless "kill" in survival mode, and finally get a "world" what you did, a painting.

From author:

The content of the entire game is very simple, and the operation is very simple, but the difficulty is extraordinary, it is time to test your patience.
If you think this game hurts you, please tell me, I will be sad for you, just one second. :)
In the end, it is not easy to make a game by oneself. I hope everyone can respect the contributions of each cre

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.9
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080

name: 墨游记 Inkball adventures
